sentence.Network_en: He hated always to be the bearer of bad tidings.
sentence.Network_cn: 他讨厌总是带去坏消息。

sentence.Network_en: I am the bearer of good tidings .
The good tidings filled the whole nation with joy.
sentence.Network_cn: 捷报传来,全国人民无不欢欣鼓舞.

PerfectNetExp.abs: t开头s结尾的英语单词_百度知道 ... tiddlywinks 弹塑料片游戏 tidings 音信 tigress 母虎.
...ngs(财产、所有物)lodgings(住处)savings(积蓄)surroundings(环境)tidings(消息)doings(行为)findings(调查结果)shavings(刨花)earnings(挣的钱)s.

list.abs: 地质英语_百度文库 ... neanderthal man 尼安德特人 neap tide 小潮 near earthquake 近地震.
Low是什么意思_爱问知识人 ... run low 短缺; 几乎耗尽 low tide 低潮 a man of low birth 出身微贱的人.
赤潮(red tide)，又称红潮，则是指在富营养化的海水中，由于甲藻、硅藻等真核藻类的大量急剧繁殖(当然也有少量蓝藻、原核动物等)…
石油词汇英语翻译(GH)--石油百科 ... high test 高质的 high tide 高潮 high torque test 高扭矩检验.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Old English tīdung 'announcement, piece of news', probably from Old Norse títhindi 'news of events', from títhr 'occurring'

entry.def: You can use tidings to refer to news that someone tells you.

example.ex: He hated always to be the bearer of bad tidings...
example.tran: 他讨厌总是带去坏消息。

example.ex: I dare to hope that your heart will be touched by the tidings of my survival.
example.tran: 我奢望你在听到我还活着的消息时心情会很激动。

means.word_mean: 1. new information about specific and timely events;

auth_sentence.content: Sad tidings...Of loss, of slaughter, and discomfiture.
auth_sentence.res_content: Sad tidings...Of loss, of slaughter, and discomfiture.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sad tidings...Of loss, of slaughter, and discomfiture.

auth_sentence.content: In spite of such tidings, the stock-market rally held.
auth_sentence.res_content: In spite of such tidings, the stock-market rally held.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In spite of such tidings, the stock-market rally held.

auth_sentence.content: Proud to be privy to portentous tidings.
auth_sentence.res_content: Proud to be privy to portentous tidings.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Proud to be privy to portentous tidings.

sentences.en: The happy tidings soon got abroad.
